burn.name: Burn
burn.description:
Blockable. Decreases by 1 every turn.
The user loses 4% of their health for each turn this is active.
Nullified out by chill effects.

stun.name: Stun
stun.description:
Blockable. Decreases by 1 every turn.
Each turn the user's Crit will be offset by -50% initially.

poison.name: Poison
poison.description:
Blockable. Decreases by 1 every turn.
Drains 1 stamina from the user each turn.

recover.name: Recover
recover.description:
Blockable. Decreases by 1 every turn.
The user gains 4% of their max health per turn.

curse.name: Curse
curse.description:
Unblockable. Never decreases.
Stays on the user, though it doesn't do anything by itself.

bullseye.name: Bullseye
bullseye.description:
Blockable. Decreases by 1 every turn.
Each turn the user's Crit will be offset by +50% initially.

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.description:
Blockable. Decreases by 1 every turn.
While in effect, each card used will increase the user's Crit by an additional 25%.

chill.name: Chill
chill.description:
Blockable. Decreases by 1 every turn.
Doesn't do anything by itself. If a user has 7 or more Chill effects at the end of a turn, they will turn into 1 Freeze effect.
Canceled out by burn effects.

freeze.name: Freeze
freeze.description:
Unblockable. Decreases by 1 every turn.
Force the user to skip a turn while active.
Frozen users are immune to chill effects while this lasts.

restore.name: Restore
restore.description:
Blockable. Decreases by 1 every turn.
Generates 1 extra energy for the user each turn.

seriate.name: Seriate
seriate.description:
Unblockable. Decreases by 1 every turn.
Each turn, the user's Crit will be offset by +10% for each Seriate effect they have.

feeble.name: Feeble
feeble.description:
Blockable. Decreases by 1 every turn.
Each damage coming directly from opponent's attacks after shielded/absorbed will increases by an additional 25%.
